answers.text: Bucket names must be at least 3 and no more than 63 characters long.
Bucket names must be unique across all existing bucket names in Amazon S3.
Bucket names are allowed to be formatted as IP Addresses like (192.168.5.4).
Bucket names must start with a lowercase letter or number.
Bucket names do not have to comply with DNS naming conventions.
Bucket names can contain uppercase characters.
